Agotime, ma ọ bụ Adangbe, bụ otu n'ime asụsụ Ghana–Togo Mountain (GTM) nke ezinụlọ Kwa
A na-asụ ya site na Adan na Agotime, na-agakwa aha Adangbe (Dangbe), nke bụ variant nke na aha Adangme (Dangme)
Agụnyeghị ya na ndepụta asụsụ GTM nke Roger Blench na-elekọta, belụsọ na ọ bụ ụdị Ahlo dị iche iche (Ago, Ig).
